pcb.name: DZ60 Soldered 60% Mechanical Keyboard PCB
pcb.description:
SPECS
DZ60 rev 3.0 Soldered PCB, 1.6mm thickness
DZ60 v2 flex cut soldered PCB (update:2022/1/3), 1.2mm thickness (includes stabilizers shims)
PCB Port: Type-C
Software Support: VIA
RGB support: RGB underglow
VIA firmware: DZ60 rev 3.0 soldered PCB DZ60 v2 flex cut PCB
QMK Flash Manual Link
Compatibility
Compatible with Tofu60%, Blade 60%, 60% Plastic, 60% ALUMINUM LOW PROFILE, 60% Bamboo, 60% Wood, KBDfans 5° 60%, D60 HHKB/WKL/WK cases
Compatible with DZ60 CNC ALUMINUM/BRASS 60% PLATE, 60% CNC'D ALUMINUM PLATE, 60% BRASS ANSI PLATE, 60% PC MATERIAL PLATE, CARBON FIBER 60% PLATE, D60 FR4/ PC PLATE/BRASS
Tutorial
instruction manual download
circuit drawing
Layout

pcb.name: DZ60RGB v2 Hot Swap Custom keyboard PCB
pcb.description:
For orders placed after 5/24/2021, the flashing method has been changed. Click here: New Flash Manual
Get the .bin file directly from here: dztech_dz60rgb_v2_via.bin
SPECS
Software Support: VIA
Layout: 63 Keys layout only
PCB Port: Type-C
RGB support: RGB Per Key
PCB Version: Hot-swap
Note: This PCB support arrow keys option
VIA Support: Download
Friendly Reminds: This PCB is compatible with Layout #4 ONLY (Scrolling down for pictures)
Compatibility

PJ0057 Aluminum Plate-B (2.25U left shift) Click here
PJ0059 Brass Plate-B (2.25U left shift) Click here

DP0003 CHERRY SCREW IN STABILIZER Link
DP0534 CHERRY PCB-MOUNT STABILIZERS Link

pcb.name: DZ60RGB-WKL Hot-Swap PCB
pcb.description:
SPECS
Software Support: VIA
PCB Port: Type-C
PCB Version: Hot-swap
RGB support: Per-key RGB
Compatibility
Support D60 keyboard (no daughter board interface)
Compatible with Tofu60, Blade60, D60 cases, etc
VIA firmware
The PCB has been pre-flashed with compatible VIA firmware already. When you plug the keyboard in, the VIA program should detect your board automatically.
Dztech_dz60rgb_wkl_v2_via.hex (QMK flash method)
Dztech_dz60rgb_wkl_v3_via.bin (USB drive flash method)

pcb.name: Bella Soldered/Hot-Swap PCB
pcb.description:
Three versions of Bella PCB
1. Soldered version，multi-layout support，do not support the RGB2. Hot-swap ANSI version comes with RGB underglow and per-key RGB3. Hot-swap ISO version comes with RGB undeglow and Per-key RGB
Important Tips
Sodered Version PCB (DP0829) must use Soldered Version Plate (DP0957)
Hot-swap PCB must use Hot-swap Plate (DP0999)
VIA firmware
kbdfans_bella_rgb_iso_via.hex
kbdfans_bella_rgb_via.hex
kbdfans_bella_soldered_via.hex

pcb.name: RS6 Hot-swap WKL PCB
pcb.description:
Specs
Hot swap version
Wired version
Type-C interface
60% WKL layout (no arrow keys)
7U spacebar, 1.75U Right Shift, 2.25U Left Shift
Per-key RGB on the top, no RGB underglow
South-facing RGB (ESC, 1 keys are North-facing RGB)
Pre-soldered Kailh sockets
RS special software to program (Only for Win OS, MAC users need to use virtual machine)
RGB settings are being updated and cannot be set temporarily
USB Drive Flash Method
Compatible with DZ60 RGB WKL PCB foam and most 60% case (such as Tofu60, Blade60, D60 case, etc.)
NOT support VIA, QMK firmware
NOT compatible with DZ60 RGB WKL Case foam
Flash Manual
RS6 Hot-swap PCB Flash Manual
